name: npm-run-help
description: Outputs entire or filtered npm scripts list with customizable documentation to the console (inspired by http://docopt.org).

scripts.test: npm run build && tape test/*.js | faucet
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:js
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run build-docs
scripts.test-travis: npm run build && npm run lint && istanbul cover node_modules/tape/bin/tape test/*.js
scripts.coverage: npm run build && istanbul cover tape test/*.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info|coveralls
scripts.build-docs: npm run build && documentation readme lib/npm-run-help.js --github --section API

author: Ben Feely <http://benfeely.com>
